text:
- Intelligent automation
as a business on AWS

has been in hyper growth
for over two years.
Businesses are stepping back

and thinking more
strategically about future

and how they can innovate
in the long term.
- What we've been seeing with automations
is that customers love it,
(upbeat music)

and they love it primarily
because of two reasons.
The first reason is cost reduction,

and we are getting anywhere
from 20 to 60% cost reduction.
And this is across the board.

And the other area is
operational effectiveness.
How much a single employee can do,

how much can you scale that
when you do automations on AWS?

And we are seeing anywhere
from 50 to 400% increase.

Our mission is about returning
hours of human effort
back to the business.
AWS works with a number of different folks
in terms of collaborations
to bring these solutions to market.
These partners are foundational

to really trying to take
a particular use case,
and to breathe life into that use case,
to make it such that we can support
those use cases in the field.
- The collaboration between AWS and Mendix

is hugely beneficial
to our joint customers.

The AWS intelligent automation
services are best in class,
and Mendix is an acknowledged leader

in low-code enterprise
application development.
By collaborating to create smart solutions
and adaptable templates,
we are providing a way for our customers
to streamline processes
with modern customizable applications.

- TrustPortal provides an
intelligent automation layer

that enables current Blue
Prism, Microsoft NICE,
UiPath and Automation anywhere customers

who are using RPA on their
on-premises automation

to move to the AWS
cloud and take advantage
of our updated digital workforce
of multi-vendor robots and mini bots.
- So what we are finding

is that the companies that
are really successful,
they're not boiling the ocean.
They're taking one step at a time.

They're going in, and it could
be that they're trying out

our solutions on marketplace,
which are readily available,
that is a free proof of value.
And so they're able to immediately engage

and start trying to get results
in the 30 day trial period.
And then they see those results

and immediately then they're
able to try to take, you know,

and make that motion
work in multiple areas.

- It helps business to
have automation solutions
on the cloud for the very same reasons
they adopt AWS in the first place,

with the key benefits including
agility, cost savings,
elasticity, faster innovation,

and the ability to deploy
globally in minutes.
(cheerful music)
